title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3264/94 of 20 December 1994 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1995 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3264/94 of 20 December 1994 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1995 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1995 fishing year, the carry-over aid for the products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (5) shall be as indicated in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 31 December 1994.
It shall apply from 1 January 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1994.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 392, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 32.
(5) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
ANNEX
1. Amount of the carry-over aid for products listed in Annex I (A) and (D) and for sole Solea spp. listed in Annex I, E to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92
